de l'avis de

  1. (adverbial) in the opinion of, according to
    de l'avis de tous, […] ― everybody agrees that
    De l'avis de certains experts, porter un masque pour se protéger du coronavirus ne sert à rien. ― Some experts think that wearing a mask is of no use against COVID.
  2. (predicative) of the same opinion as, of a mind with
    Je ne suis pas de votre avis. ― I don't share your opinion.

Usage notes

[edit]
  • When used adverbially, this expression cannot take a possessive pronoun as complement: **de mon avis, …, **de votre avis, …; à mon avis, à ton avis, à votre avis are used instead.
  • Not to be confused with de l'aveu de.

Related terms

[edit]
  • d'avis
